scripts.pre-release: version=$(cat ../coredns-dist/package.json | jq -r '.version') && corednsVersion=$(echo $version | sed -e 's/-[0-9]*$//g' | sed -e 's/^v//g') && jq '.version = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && curl -LO https://github.com/coredns/coredns/releases/download/v${corednsVersion}/coredns_${corednsVersion}_darwin_amd64.tgz && tar -xvf coredns_*.tgz && rm coredns_*.tgz
